1.0.name: wordpress/wp-amazon-mp3-widget
1.0.description:
Add slick looking Amazon MP3 widgets to your blog posts in a brain-dead simple way! Just say [mp3] to add mp3 tracks anywhere on your blog.

The MP3 Clips widget plays album previews and displays the album art in the background. It's as easy as typing [mp3] anywhere in your post and you get a beautiful Flash widget with mp3 tracks.

There are many ways to create an MP3 widget. Here are some:

  1. [mp3]
    This creates an MP3 widge containing the latest MP3 bestselling tracks.

  2. [mp3 list="Bestsellers" browse_node="324527011"] <br/> This creates a MP3 widge containing the latest 'Hard Rock and Metal' bestsellers. You can get the browse_node values for various music genres here: http://www.browsenodes.com/node-324382011.html

Here are the most popular browse nodes: Alternative Rock (324384011) Blues (324396011) Bro
